name: Feed The Bunnies
description:
Shoot the berry to the bunny with the respective color, to feed them. Otherwise they will be killed.

Control with up and down arrows, press space to shoot.

All assets, sfx and music were made by Bee Tracks.

Game made for #LOWREZJAM and #ShortNSweetJam.

Please, rate it:

  • LOWREZJAM: https://itch.io/jam/lowrezjam2017/rate/166529
  • ShortNSweetJam: https://itch.io/jam/shortnsweet/rate/166529
